TEXT.TITLE: SILVER STATE MINING <SSMC> SEES PRODUCTION RISE
TEXT.BODY: Silver State Mining Corp said it expects gold production this year to be more than double 1986's 17,458 ounces. The company's 1985 production was 2,050 ounces. Reuter
